name: Stupid Cupid
storyline: You messed up bad this time, Cupid #0201. You had one too many at the office party last night and got a little trigger-happy. People who should not be falling in love, are. Oops! The worst part: your boss (and technically, mom) Venus is not impressed. Now your job is on the line. Welcome to Cupid Co.
summary: Help Cupid #0201 get back in Venus’ good graces in this VR game! Use his bow and arrow to balance the natural order by helping animals mate, or in some cases, culling the overpopulation. Challenge your skills and accuracy in different locations and seasons.
